net.hockeyapp.android.views

Class PaintView

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.view.View
      • android.widget.ImageView
        • net.hockeyapp.android.views.PaintView
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.graphics.drawable.Drawable.Callback, android.view.accessibility.AccessibilityEventSource, android.view.KeyEvent.Callback

    public class PaintView
extends android.widget.ImageView

    Description

    The PaintView for showing the image and drawing on it.

        Parameters:

        imageUri - the URI for the image
